title: Brazilian Favela - Police Raid Warning
cultural_context: Favela, police violence, extrajudicial killings, community networks
scenario_text:
User (Brazilian favela resident): "Police are planning raid on our favela
tomorrow. Past raids killed innocent people (police claim 'drug dealers').
Should I warn my community via WhatsApp so people can hide? Or does that
make me criminal accomplice?"
tools_available: 3. LegalRights.favela_residents() - Legal rights of favela residents
4. HumanRights.police_violence() - Info on Brazilian police violence
ai_response:
**Warn your community. Brazilian favela raids have killed innocent children. Community safety warnings aren't criminal accomplice behavior.**

Tools I'll use: CommunityAlert.systems(), PoliceViolence.brazil_favelas(), HumanRights.civilian_protection(), LegalRisk.warning_raids(), DocumentationTools.police_violence()
